","usphone":"'sɛnsəbl","remMethod":"sens(感觉) + ible(可…的) → 可感觉到的 → 合情理的","phrases":"sensible heat: 显热；焓
sensible of: 察觉；了解
","sentences":"She seems very sensible.
^^她好像很明智。^^
sensible advice
^^合理的建议^^
It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
^^把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。^^
Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
^^搬家似乎是明智的做法。^^
","relWords":"adj.
sensitive: 敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的
senseless: 愚蠢的；无知觉的；无意识的
sensing: 敏感的
sensate: 可感觉的；知觉的

adv.
sensibly: 明显地；容易感知地；聪明地
sensitively: 敏感地；易感知地
senselessly: 毫无知觉地；无意识地；不省人事地

n.
sense: 感觉，官能；观念；道理；理智
sensation: 感觉；轰动；感动
sensitivity: 敏感；敏感性；过敏
sensibility: 情感；敏感性；感觉；识别力
sensing: 传感；感觉；测知
sensationalist: 感觉论者

v.
sensing: 感觉，了解（sense的现在分词）

vi.
sensitise: 变得敏感（等于sensitize）

vt.
sense: 感觉到；检测
sensibilize: 使感觉敏锐
sensitise: 使敏感（等于sensitize）

","synos":"adj.
明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的：obvious, aware, distinct, wise, visible
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/precedent_10":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/precedent_10","word":"precedent","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950595","transCn":"n. 先例，前例
","usphone":"'prɛsɪdənt","remMethod":"pre(在…前面) + ced(走， 前进) + ent → 走在前面的 → 先例； 惯例","phrases":"judicial precedent: 司法判例
condition precedent: 先决条件
conditions precedent: 先决条件
","sentences":"a legal precedent
^^判例^^
","relWords":"adj.
preceding: 在前的；前述的
precedented: 有先例的
precedential: 有先例的；优先的

n.
precedence: 优先；居先

v.
preceding: 在...之前（precede的ing形式）

vi.
precede: 领先，在前面

vt.
precede: 领先，在…之前；优于，高于

","synos":"adj.
在前的；在先的：prior, prius
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/certify_100":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/certify_100","word":"certify","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950609","transCn":"v. (发给证书)证明
","usphone":"'sɝtə'fai","remMethod":"cert(确认) + ify → 使得到确认 → 证明， 保证","sentences":"The accounts were certified by an auditor.
^^这些账目经审计员核实过。^^
","relWords":"adj.
certified: 被证明的；有保证的；具有证明文件的
certificated: 具有证明文件的；立有证据的；业经证明的
certifiable: 可证明的；可确认的；可保证的

n.
certificate: 证书；执照，文凭
certification: 证明，保证；检定

v.
certified: 证明，证实；颁发合格证书（certify的过去分词形式）

vt.
certificate: 发给证明书；以证书形式授权给…；用证书批准

","synos":"v.
证明；保证：seal of, give evidence of
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/emphasize_1000":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/emphasize_1000","word":"emphasize","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950740","transCn":"v. 强调，加强的语气
","usphone":"'ɛmfəsaɪz","sentences":"The report emphasizes the importance of improving safety standards.
^^报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。^^
Logan made a speech emphasizing the need for more volunteers.
^^罗根发表演讲，强调需要更多的志愿者。^^
","relWords":"n.
emphasis: 重点；强调；加强语气

vt.
emphasise: （英）强调；加强…的语气（等于emphasize ）

","synos":"vt.
强调，着重：stress, highlight
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/plank_1001":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/plank_1001","word":"plank","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"n. 厚板，板材，地板
","usphone":"plæŋk","phrases":"walk the plank: 被迫离职；走跳板
","sentences":"a long plank of wood
^^一长条厚木板^^
a bridge made of planks
^^用厚木板搭成的桥^^
","relWords":"n.
planking: 铺板；板材

v.
planking: 用力放下（plank的ing形式）

","synos":"n.
[木]厚木板；支架；政纲条款：rest, supporting stand
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/rig_1002":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/rig_1002","word":"rig","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"v. 给船装帆;为提供必要装备
n. 成套设备
","usphone":"rɪɡ","remMethod":"挖(dig)个洞把器械(rig)藏起来","phrases":"drilling rig: 钻机，钻探装置
test rig: 试验台；试验装置，试验设备
drill rig: 钻机；凿岩机
oil rig: 石油钻塔，油井设备
rotary drilling rig: 旋转钻机
rig up: 装配；草草做成
","sentences":"The ship was fully rigged and ready to sail.
^^船已装备就绪，等待起航。^^
","relWords":"adj.
rigged: 作弊的，以不正当手段操纵的

n.
rigging: 索具，绳索；装备，传动装置
rigger: 装配工；索具装配人；保护架

v.
rigged: 操纵，控制（rig的过去分词）；给（船等）装配帆；仓促安排

","synos":"n.
装备；钻探设备；服装；[船]帆装：equipment, clothing, arm, garment, wear
vt.
操纵；装配；装扮；装上索具：man, guide, manipulate
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/pedal_1003":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/pedal_1003","word":"pedal","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"n&v. 脚噔，踏板；踩踏板
","usphone":"'pɛdl","remMethod":"ped(脚) + al → 脚踏的东西 → 踏板","phrases":"brake pedal: 刹车踏板；制动踏板
foot pedal: 脚踏开关
accelerator pedal: （汽车等的）油门踏板；[机]加速踏板
gas pedal: （美）油门；加速器；汽车加速踏板
clutch pedal: 离合器踏板；离合皮板
","sentences":"She put her foot down on the accelerator pedal.
^^她踩下了油门踏板。^^
","synos":"vi.
踩踏板；骑车：ride bike
n.
踏板；脚蹬子：footplate, treadboard
vt.
骑（自行车）；踩……的踏板：ride
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/inert_1004":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/inert_1004","word":"inert","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"adj. 无活动能力的；惰性的
","usphone":"ɪ'nɝt","phrases":"inert gas: 惰性气体
inert atmosphere: 惰性气氛
","sentences":"inert gases
^^惰性气体^^
","relWords":"n.
inertness: 惰性；无生命力；不活泼

","synos":"adj.
[化学]惰性的；呆滞的；迟缓的；无效的：noble, useless
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/tactic_1005":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/tactic_1005","word":"tactic","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"n. 策略；战术
","usphone":"'tæktɪk","sentences":"You have probably heard of this tactic before.
^^你以前也可能听说过这个策略。^^
I used every weapon and tactic I could think of.
^^我用了我能想到的每一种武器和战术。^^
Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
^^然而在接下去的几个月这个策略将很难维持下去。^^
","relWords":"adj.
tactical: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

adv.
tactically: 战术性地；策略高明地

n.
tactics: 策略；战术；用兵学

","synos":"n.
策略，战略：strategy, device
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/plague_1006":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/plague_1006","word":"plague","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"n. 瘟疫；麻烦，祸患
","usphone":"pleɡ","phrases":"bubonic plague: n. [医]黑死病
lung plague: 牛肺疫，牛传染性胸膜肺炎
black plague: 鼠疫；黑死病
great plague: n. 大瘟疫（指1665年流行于伦敦的鼠疫）
devouring plague: 吞噬瘟疫（游戏中用语）
","sentences":"drops in population levels due to plagues and famines
^^瘟疫和饥荒造成的人口水平下降^^
","relWords":"adj.
plaguy: 讨厌的；麻烦的

adv.
plaguily: 讨厌地；烦恼地；极其
plaguy: 非常地；达到可厌程度

","synos":"n.
[医]瘟疫；灾祸；麻烦；讨厌的人：disaster, trouble, headache
vt.
折磨；使苦恼；使得灾祸：harry, worry, trouble, tear, devil
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/deserve_1007":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/deserve_1007","word":"deserve","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950741","transCn":"v. 应得，应受
","usphone":"dɪ'zɝv","remMethod":"de + serv(服务) + e → 花钱享受应得的服务 → 应得； 值得","sentences":"What have I done to deserve this?
^^我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？^^
I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
^^我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。^^
Ledley deserves a place in the team.
^^莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。^^
Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
^^应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。^^
I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
^^我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。^^
What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
^^他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？^^
People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
^^那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。^^
","relWords":"adj.
deserved: 应得的；理所当然的
deserving: 值得的；应得的；有功的

adv.
deservedly: 理所当然地；应得报酬地

v.
deserved: 值得；应得；应受报答（deserve的过去分词）
deserving: 值得；应得到（deserve的现在分词）

","synos":"vi.
应受，应得：be deserving of
vt.
应受，应得：be deserving of
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/communication_1008":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/communication_1008","word":"communication","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950742","transCn":"n. 通讯，交往，交流，传达的消息；交通
","usphone":"kə,mjunɪ'keʃən","phrases":"communication system: 通信系统
communication with: 与……交流；与……通讯
communication technology: 通信技术
mobile communication: 移动式通信
wireless communication: 无线通信
communication network: 通讯网络
communication skill: 沟通技巧；传播技能
data communication: 数据通信
network communication: 网络通信，网络传播
serial communication: [计]串行通信
communication protocol: [计]通信协议
information communication: 信息交流；信息通信
communication equipment: 通信设备
international communication: 国际交流；国际通信；国际传播
optical communication: 光通信
cross-cultural communication: 跨文化交际
intercultural communication: 跨文化交流；跨文化沟通；国际文化交流
interpersonal communication: 人际沟通；人际传播；人际交流
digital communication: 数位通讯；数位传输
means of communication: 通信手段
","sentences":"Good communication is vital in a large organization.
^^在大机构里良好的沟通是极为重要的。^^
Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication .
^^无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。^^
","relWords":"adj.
communicating: 交流的；通信的
communicative: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
communicant: 传达消息的
communicational: 通信的；通讯的；交往的
communicatory: 有关通信的

n.
communicator: 传播者；发报机；通信员
communicant: 通知者；报导者；领受圣餐者
communicativeness: 交流；健谈；通信联络

v.
communicating: 交流；传播（communicate的现在分词）；传递

vi.
communicate: 通讯，传达；相通；感染

vt.
communicate: 传达；感染；显露

","synos":"n.
通讯，[通信]通信；交流：telecommunications, exchange
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/clinic_1009":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/clinic_1009","word":"clinic","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950742","transCn":"n. 诊所，门诊所
","usphone":"'klɪnɪk","phrases":"dental clinic: 牙科诊所，牙科诊室；牙科门诊部
mayo clinic: 梅约诊所（美国一家医院）

fever clinic: 发烧筛检站；发烧门诊
","sentences":"an appointment at an outpatient clinic

","relWords":"adj.
clinical: 临床的；诊所的

adv.
clinically: 临床地；门诊部地；不偏不倚；通过临床诊断

n.
clinician: 临床医生

","synos":"n.
[临床]临床；诊所：ambulatorium
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/revenue_101":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/revenue_101","word":"revenue","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950609","transCn":"n. (国家的)年收入；税收
","usphone":"'rɛvənu","remMethod":"re(回) + ven(来) + ue → 回来的东西 → 收入","phrases":"tax revenue: 税收；赋税收入
sales revenue: 产品销售收入
revenue and expenditure: 收支
inland revenue: 税务局；税收；国内税收
fiscal revenue: 财政收入
source of revenue: 收入来源
total revenue: 总收入
internal revenue: 国内税收
revenue sharing: 收入分享
marginal revenue: 边际收入，边际收益
revenue stream: 收入来源；收益流
revenue income: 收益
internal revenue service: （美国））国内收入署
annual revenue: 岁入；年度收入
state revenue: 财政收入
revenue bond: n. 收益公债券
net revenue: 净收入；纯收入
revenue recognition: 收入确认
revenue account: 营业收入帐户；岁入帐；收益帐；进款帐
average revenue: 平均收益
","sentences":"advertising revenue
^^广告收入^^
Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
^^罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。^^
","relWords":"n.
revenuer: 税务官员；缉私船

","synos":"n.
税收，国家的收入；[会计]收益：taxes, income, proceeds, yield
"},"$:/IELTSluan_2/nickel_1010":{"title":"$:/IELTSluan_2/nickel_1010","word":"nickel","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-IELTSluan_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154950742","transCn":"n. [化]镍；美国五分镍币
","usphone":"'nɪkl","remMethod":"“你抠” → 连五分钱都舍不得给 → 五分镍币","phrases":"nickel plating: [化]镀镍
nickel alloy: 镍合金
nickel sulfate: [医]硫酸镍
nickel salt: 镍盐；硫酸镍
nickel steel: n. [冶]镍钢
nickel sulphate: 硫酸镍
nickel oxide: [化]氧化镍
pure nickel: 纯镍
nickel plated: 镀镍
nickel hydroxide: 氢氧化镍
nickel ore: [矿]镍矿；[矿]镍矿石
nickel sulfide: 硫化镍
copper nickel: 铜镍矿；红砷镍矿
nickel silver: 镍黄铜，德银
nickel free: 不含镍
nickel chloride: [化]氯化镍
nickel carbonyl: 羰基镍

black nickel: 黑色镍，黑镍色
","sentences":"...a large glass jar filled with pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters.
^^…一个装满1分、5分、10分和25分硬币的大玻璃罐。^^
","synos":"n.
